citations.relevantSnippet:
La contribution prévue à l’article 66, 6o, du règlement
général de procédure, liquidée à la somme de 24 euros, est mise à la
charge des parties requérantes.

extractionNotes: ART-ECLI:BE:RVSCE:2026:ARR.265.352-001 (article 12) is mentioned only in the procedural description (block-017) and is not substantively interpreted or applied by the Court; per guidelines, formal/procedural mentions were excluded from citations.
ART-ECLI:BE:RVSCE:2026:ARR.265.352-002 (article 66, 6o) is applied in the operative/judgment part (block-041); that block is cited as the Court's application of the provision.
